title: Check out the translation for "amanitas" on SpanishDictionary.com!
description: Translate millions of words and phrases for free on SpanishDictionary.com, the world's largest Spanish-English dictionary and translation website.
text:
amanita [ˌæməˈnaɪtə]
English to Spanish
amanita
amanita
A noun is a word referring to a person, animal, place, thing, feeling or idea (e.g. man, dog, house).
[noun](http://www.spanishdict.com/guide/masculine-and-feminine-nouns)
1. (botany)
a.
[la amanita](/translate/la%20amanita)
(f) means that a noun is feminine. Spanish nouns have a gender, which is either feminine (like la mujer or la luna) or masculine (like el hombre or el sol).
[(F)](http://www.spanishdict.com/guide/masculine-and-feminine-nouns)
Those bright red mushrooms are amanitas.Esos hongos rojo vivo son amanitas.
